TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MeasureItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 、、 和 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the , , , and controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 、、或 的 `OwnerDraw` 属性设置为 `true`时，将发送此事件。This event is sent when the `OwnerDraw` property of , , , or is set to `true`. 它用于告知绘图函数如何调整项的大小。It is used to tell the drawing function how to size an item. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性对 中的项执行自定义绘制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform custom drawing of the items in a . summary.span: 获取要测量的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object to measure against.

value.span: 用于确定正在绘制的项刻度 对象。

span.span: The object to use to determine the scale of the item you are drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 对象确定设置 和 时要使用的刻度。You use a object to determine the scale to use when setting the and . 不同类型的图形对象可以具有不同的刻度，如监视屏幕和打印机之间的测量刻度差异。Different types of graphics objects can have different scales, such as the difference in measurement scale between a monitor screen and a printer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性对 中的项执行自定义绘制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform custom drawing of the items in a . The width of the item measured.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员仅由 使用。This member is only used by . 使用此属性可以确保菜单的宽度至少与菜单列表中最宽的菜单项的宽度相同。You use this property to ensure the menu is at least as wide as the widest menu item in the menu list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性对 中的项执行自定义绘制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform custom drawing of the items in a .
